unnormalised: Regarding rooftop solar subsidies, a comprehensive review is warranted. The current scheme, while promising, needs better implementation, particularly in states like Bihar. Disbursal delays exceeding 6 months are unacceptable. Perhaps linking subsidies to Aadhaar, similar to DBT, could improve efficiency. A target date of 31/12/2024 for achieving pan-India coverage seems optimistic, considering ground realities. Transparency is key. Public awareness campaigns in Hindi and other regional languages, starting 01/10/2023 at 11:00 hrs, are crucial. A session on 26/01/2024 at IIT-Delhi to address concerns would be beneficial.
